task.title: Viewing mapped licenses on Windows
task.shortdesc: After the succesful installation and registration, check if all the licenses are mapped to your.

step.cmd: Navigate to theenterprisefolder in the product installation directory.

info.note: Replace “FQDN-Hostname” with the name of the Fully Qualified Domain Machine name of the computer where you installed. Use the port number that you specified at the installation time.
